scenario_text.value:
*huff, huff* Dammit! My body isn’t moving the
way it should...
WereGarurumon!
You... Wow, haha...
Go ahead and laugh if you want.

No, I would never laugh at you! I’d never do
such a thing!
It has always pained me, you know.

Leaving this world without you... I always
regretted that.
I wouldn’t blame you if you hated me for it.

And yet...you heard me out at the altar, and
you fought for me!

That’s why...this time I refuse to leave your
side!

I’ll be here with you always, no matter what
happens!
Wait a minute. Aki...haru?
Yes, WereGarurumon?

I always thought it might be you but was
afraid to accept it.

Your face has changed... But you’re the same
old Akiharu, aren’t you?
Yes, it’s me. It’s me, Akiharu!
You finally came back.
I’m sorry it took me so long. Forgive me.
So you didn’t just abandon me...
No! I would never do that to you!

Now I’m prepared to fight with you till the
very end!
Thank you, Akiharu!

What the heck are you two blabbing about?
Just die already!

Well, I don’t know about—AGH! What the...?
Ngh...

I remember now. My bond with Akiharu...
It makes me stronger!
Your bond? What?!

Someone who doesn’t trust humans could never
understand!

Just knowing Akiharu is at my side sends fire
surging through my body!

Nothing can hold me back when I’m fighting
for Akiharu!
UWAAAAAAAAAH!!!
WereGarurumon!

Thank you, Akiharu. You give me the strength
to keep fighting!
WereGarurumon, evolve tooo...!
Metal...Garurumon!
